phrases: How long are you going to stay here, Dad?
You would be sad if I left, right, Sota?
I am wondering the same thing, sweetheart.
Yuriko... do I not have a home here?
I am just wondering if your job is okay with you being here so long.
It is your best buddy, Miyamura.
C'mon, it is hot enough without you smothering him.
Damn, you sure are sweating hard.
Makes sense with the summer heat.
It is actually a cold sweat.
You should take a bath with me!
I have already filled the bath.
It will be a while before dinner is ready.
You do not want to bathe with me?
-Aww, do not be shy, it will be fun!
-Aww, do not be shy, it will be fun!
-Aww, do not be shy, it will be fun!
These are not yakuza tattoos, I swear!
I know this is going to be a dumb question,
but these are disposable chopsticks, right?
You ate dinner with them and you just noticed?
But Miyamura-kun's got part of a matching set.
Might as well just stay the night.
Thanks for the offer, but I should not...
If Izumi-kun sleeps over, we will not have a futon for you, sweetheart!
And why does he get priority over me?!
Are you going to sleep over?!
I would not want to impose...
You can sleep in my room!
Miyamura-kun's going to sleep with Daddy!
Sorry you have got to share a room with this old fart.
Bet you wish you were in Kyoko's room.
What do you like about my daughter?
This Summer's Going to Be a Hot One
This Summer's Going to Be a Hot One
Feels like I barely got any sleep.
Feels like I barely got any sleep.
She is wearing her middle-school gym clothes.
Have a good day at school!
Want me to walk you there?
Follow me and you are dead.
When you leave home in the morning, you should say see you later.
Did they just come out of the same house?
You have elective with her, right?
She is super smart, and pretty cute, too.
Why the hell is she dating Miyamura?
Hell, I would be a way better match for her!
Oh my God, what is wrong with her?!
They are all talking shit about them behind their backs!
And they are probably hearing it, too.
They were yapping about it in the same damn room!
Even people from other classes are joining in on it, too.
Just when Miyamura had finally gotten there...
Bet all the guys you rejected are crying about that right now!
I did not turn down that many, you know.
C'mon, do not get all humble on us, Hori-san.
Do not pay attention to them, Miyamura.
I told Hori this, too, but keep your chin up!
Oh, shit, is he skipping school?
He will be here after lunch.
Why did you cut your hair?
Oh, I mean, it is summer.
He cut it'because it is summer!
Hey, why are you still wearing your winter uniform?
Wow, your piercings are so cool!
Your family runs a bakery, right?
This probably will not last long.
Why is it so cold in here?!
Shu, you win the award for Best Reaction.
Oh, it is just you, Miyamura!
Summer is a good time for that kind of stuff.
I will text it to you!
C'mon, do not try to outdo them!
You are cannot recognize your best buddy after a haircut?
Did you get dumped or something?!
If I would dumped him, I would not bring him over!
I do not belong to you.
C'mon, Shindo-kun, his hair'll grow back.
C'mon, Shindo-kun, his hair'll grow back.
Damn, this is a huge bag.
Damn, this is a huge bag.
I gave a bunch out to people in my class already.
Hori-san, what flavor do you like?
I have got pomegranate and fig.
No, Chika took all the normal flavors with her.
So now you have just got the weird ones.
Which flavor is that one, Hori-san?
You do not like cheese, right, Shindo?
I would rather throw my wallet in a ditch than choke down cheese.
You know it is not, asshole!
Miyamura, could you get me some water?
You are the one who made me eat it!
Okay, then you should give this flavor a try!
The girls've stopped coming around to bother you.
Honestly, it is a big relief...
No, I do not think I do.
Why was she glaring at me?
Why was she glaring at you?
We were watching TV when it came on out of nowhere!
Okay, she is really freaking me out here!
When are you breaking up with her?!
When are you breaking up with Hori-senpai?!
When are you breaking up with her?!
I am Honoka Sawada from Class 2-5, and I will be back!
You really do not have to come back.
So she is a second-year, huh.
She comes to stalk me on every break.
Why do you keep following him around?
I had no idea you were taken!
He is so lanky and has so many piercings!
I had a crush on you first, Hori-senpai!
Sorry, I was listening in'because it looked hilarious.
Can you do something about her?!
What did you say I am?
Sawada-san, if you were a guy, I would have headbutted you by now!
I like her more than you!
Why do you even like this guy, Hori-senpai?!
Let me think for a second.
You have to think about it?!
I do not know, this is still pretty damn funny.
I made these in home ec!
Get your paws off her, Sawada.
Hori-senpai told me I could still talk to her!
Let us get back to class!
Let us go back to class.
You have to stop popping in out of nowhere!
She went home early to get some stuff done.
Guess I will go home, too.
Why are you going this way?!
Why are you going this way?!
What kind of whacky coincidence is this?
Oh, jeez, I left the key inside...
Do you just let anyone and everyone into your place, Miyamura?
Hori-san does not even come over that often.
Maybe things are not going as well as I thought!
No, I just always go over to her place.
So, Miyamura, do you have any siblings?
Nope, it is just me, my mom, and my dad.
I totally assumed you had a little brother or sister.
Because you are good at taking care of people.
He was a year older than me.
C'mon, I am just joking around!
You can come over for cake whenever you want.
Yes, that did happen to the Sawadas next door.
It is so sad that they had to lose their eldest like that.
You probably did not see him much, since he went to a different school.
Last year in... I do not remember when.
Who are you waiting for, Sawada-san?
You are trying to ambush Hori-san!
Who do you think you are?!
You are not the boss of me!
At least tell us what your first name is!
Hey, uh... want to head home?
I was just trying to think of what to say...
Do guys make you uncomfortable, Sawada?
You know, I am also a guy...
I have taken a bath at Hori-san's house!
Then I am going to do that, too!
No, I got to return it tomorrow.
Horror movies really freak me out.
I cannot believe my own daughter would bully me like this...
It is okay, they scare me, too.
This whole series is about a girl planning to murder her father!
You are reading too much into this.
Do you really like this movie that much, Hori?
Man, I so relate to this main character.
All this time, I sucked it up and took it.
I am going to go buy smokes!
Do not come looking for me!
You never make any moves on me, huh.
She is the one who said it, but now she is all embarrassed.
Nothing, just thought you were being really cute.
Hori-san, what kind of moves do you want me to make?
What, did I interrupt something going on in here?
Let us reenact that scene from the movie.
We are going to marathon all three movies!
You are Here, I am Here
